column5: Fished Armit and Gage, which were two of their lakes, several years back. Nice cabins, great accomodations, and could not beat the food they supplied. Boats were small 14 footers with 9.9 or 15 hp. Seats in them were not the most comfortable. Numbers were great as far as walleyes. Never got anything bigger than 25". Would not hesitate to use this outfitter. It is a first class fly-in.
Jim,What lake were you fishing on? Sounds like a great place.Post some pictures please.Maddogg

I have been going to Hidden Bay Lodge in Sioux Lookout, Ontario for over 10 years. Walleye catch has been over the top incredible with not only 14 lb Pigs to 1000 plus fish in a 3 1/2 day trip. Ocomodations are the best I've seen in Canada, excluding the all inclusive guided trips, these cabins are not only remote, but placed well, so you don't have to travel miles to find a hot spot. Most of the fly in cabins are located on prime spots for fishing. Nice boats with comfortable seats and reliable outboards. Cabins are loaded with canned foods and high end refrigerators, as well as hot and cold running water and toilets, showers, etc. Also, a very important feature is the Sat Phone system if you have to call home or for emergency. I would highly recommend this Lodge.
Yeap ten years one post. Things that make you say hummmm!!!
He forgot to mention they provide protective gear to guard against the fish hurling themselves into the boat.
I've been on this board for 12 years and this is the first time this has happened!!!???
We did go to Hidden Bay this year, and I have to say I agree with most of what JG says. 14 lber...I didn't see anything over 4 lbs and our group (3) caught only 700 +
I have nothing but good things to say about Hidden Bay. Been a long time customer. Original post may have been a little over the top but it is a first class operation.
This place is on my bucket list. They have replied to a post of mine, they offered to address all of my questions. Check their website. If I could put a group together I would give them a chance!
